activities: Johnson & Johnson Consumer Inc. receives personal information in various forms relating to personnel, including prospective and former employees. These data may be transferred from the EU/Switzerland to the US and are used to carry out the company’s human resource function. Additionally, Neutrogena brand recevies personnel information related to clinical trials.
eucountries: Austria, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities Panel (DPAs) Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner of Switzerland (FDPIC)
